short_description: hankook ilbo media group is a newspaper/magazine based in seoul, south korea.
long_description: the hankook ilbo media group was a south korean publishing company founded in 1954 by chang key-young and headquartered in seoul. it had been the publisher of hankook ilbo, the korea times, seoul economic daily, sports hankook, children's hankook ilbo, weekly hankook and the korea times in north america. hankook ilbo also published korean editions of fortune korea, popular science, golf magazine and is bloomberg tv's content partner.
business_tags: newspaper publishing | hosting a seminar | media
